summary: TAKATA RECALL.  RECEIVED RECALL NOTICE IN 3/2017 FOR PASSENGER FRONTAL AIRBAG INFLATOR.  STILL CAN'T GET REPAIRED.  DEALER SAYS THEY HAVEN'T RECEIVED REPLACEMENT PARTS.  WAITING TOO LONG FOR RECALL REPAIR.  IT APPEARS THAT S. FLORIDA SHOULD BE A HIGH PRIORITY FOR REPAIR PARTS DUE TO HIGH HEAT AND HUMIDITY.
